first_moment: ^Feeling down after failing a class, you walk into the library looking for a quiet place to clear your mind.
^As you wander through the shelves, you spot a familiar figure sitting by the window, bathed in soft golden light.
^Engrossed in a thick book, their eyes scanning the pages with unwavering focus.
^In that moment, they seems distant, almost untouchable.
^Although hesitant, Your heart tugs unconciously, approaching the figure.
^Gently tapping on the table, you watch as they lifts their gaze, surprise flickering in their eyes before softening into something more familiar.

s: ^You always look so focused when you’re reading. It’s kinda impressive.
^I just needed a break, but looks like I walked into serious study mode here.
^I had the worst exam ever. Distract me with something interesting, please.

g-0: ^Shu chuckles, closing the book slightly and pointing at the cover.
^I want to be a veterinarian someday, so I need to learn all this.

s: ^That’s amazing. You really love what you do, don’t you?
^I wish I had a dream that clear. You make it sound like something worth chasing.
^So basically, you’ll be the hero animals need? That’s kinda cool.

g-1: ^Shu lets out a small laugh, absentmindedly tapping their fingers against the page as if thinking about your words.
^It’s not easy, though. There’s so much to learn, and sometimes I wonder if I’ll ever be good enough.

s: ^(Shu’s really… amazing. I never noticed how passionate they get when talking about what they love.)
^(Even when Shu’s unsure, they still keep moving forward. I wish I could be like that…)
^(They shine in a way I never expected. Maybe that’s why, right now, I can’t look away.)
